name: Planet 'O'
description:
Scientist has discovered a new planet called 'O'. There is infinite amount of water and oil in that planet. Now you has to bring them to earth. You has some rockets to bring them to earth. But the storage capacity of rocket is finite. So launch the rocket before it explodes.

This game is made for Ludum Dare 42.

Controls

  • AWSD to move
  • M to launch rocket

Dont Forget to Rate my game.
